Roshini Bhar.Description: Spiced chicken or lamb tikka cooked with garlic and a blend of spices

Korai.Description: Lamb or chicken tikka in a medium curry sauce with a selection of fresh herbs, green peppers, onions and tomatoes served in an individual skillet

Chicken Satha.Description: Thinly sliced chicken pieces cooked nice and spicy with potatoes, onions topped with fried mushrooms

Prawn Jhul.Description: Special prawns cooked in a unique blend of spices with fresh garlic, ginger, onions, tomatoes and fresh coriander

Azuba Chicken.Description: A special medium dish prepared with garlic, ginger and coriander , then cooked onions, tomatoes, green peppers, mushrooms and a special spicy thick sauce

King Prawn Sally.Description: Bhuna style topped with crispy potatoes

Karma Sutra.Description: Lovers be aware this is an aphrodisiac. lamb or chicken cooked with white wine, hot and spicy secret spices served with pilau rice

Gurkhas Revenge.Description: Tender pieces of grilled lamb or chicken in garlic and chilli sauce. Full of flavour, hot and spicy

Bengal Bad Boy.Description: For all you chili lovers, chicken or lamb specially created using several spices and specially imported naga pickle

Khondani.Description: A special award winning king prawn medium dish marinated in ginger, coriander, yoghurt and herbs, cooked with sliced onion, spices, green and red peppers

Machli Jhul.Description: A delicious fish curry in tomato, olives and coriander base with a hint of garlic and white wine

Goana Mas Curry.Description: Fish cooked in coconut milk with chillies
